Nail polish removal made easy-breezy!

Plum Color Affair Nail Polish Remover is an acetone-free remover that's easy to use & quick to work on removing even the darkest shades of nail polish. products.title: Plum Color Affair 3-in-1 Strengthener, Base & Top Coat | 7-Free Formula | With AHA & Avocado Oil | 100% Vegan & Cruelty-Free
products.body_html:
A multitasker, packed with benefits! 

It can help strengthen brittle nails, make your nail polish chip-resistant for days after application & also help retain its glossy finish! For extra care, it's enriched with a touch of AHA to rejuvenate the nail plate & avocado oil to give your nails a boost of keratin.

7-free formula

1. NO Toluene: because neurotoxicants & irritants are a no-no!
2. NO Dibutyl Phthalate: an endocrine disruptor & developmental toxicant 
3. NO Camphor: we will never formulate with ingredients that are harmful when inhaled! 
4. NO Free Formaldehyde: it can cause allergic reactions, asthma & nausea
5. NO Formaldehyde Resin: known to cause allergies, dermatitis & affect the reproductive system
6. NO Ethyl Tosylamide: an allergen & endocrine disruptor
7. NO Xylene: a neurotoxicant & irritant that can cause dizziness when inhaled

More Reasons to ♥

  • 3-in-1 formula that works its charm as:
    • a hardening treatment - helps strengthen brittle nails when applied consistently, twice a week
    • a base coat - prevents your nail polish from chipping for days after application
    • a top coat - helps retain the glossy finish of your nail polish for a longer duration
  • a touch of AHA & avocado oil for extra nourishment
  • wide & curved brush for easy, end-to-end application
  • air-dries easily

products.title: Specialist Serums - Starter Pack | Set of 5 Face Serums
products.body_html:
Mini booster drops for your skin

We believe in enjoying the little things in life, literally! So here is a mini dose of our biggie skincare specialists packed with the same punch of goodness that will leave your skin pampered, plump, and protected! It's tough not to fall in love with these cuties and the drops of goodness within them.


Reasons to ♥

  • 15% Vitamin C Serum with Mandarin: If your skin needs a major glow boost then you're in the right place. This serum is thoughtfully formulated with ethyl ascorbic acid to fight pigmentation, Kakadu plum to promote skin rejuvenation and Japanese mandarin to bring an instant glow to the skin. Too good to be true? It sure is! This must-have plum is a power pack of the best glow boosters & antioxidants
  • 2% Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Bulgarian Rose: Looking for soft, bouncy, hydrated skin? This 2% Hyaluronic Acid with Bulgarian Rose is here for you! It is packed with sodium hyaluronate to keep skin hydrated, rose water extracts to soothe dry and inflamed skin and natural humectants to keep skin plump. Fun Fact: Hyaluronic Acid can hold water up to 1,000 times its weight! All that moisture helps keep your skin healthy, plump and happily hydrated!
  • 10% Niacinamide Serum with Rice Water: This clever concoction has been thoughtfully formulated with niacinamide to target spots, soothe acne and regulate sebum production along with rice ferment extract to minimize fine lines and olive-derived squalane to fight free radicals and slow down aging. A real multi-tasking face serum... Phew!
  • 1% Retinol Serum with Bakuchiol: This retinol serum strikes the perfect balance between efficacy and gentleness. It helps boosts collagen production—making skin look supple, firm, and youthful. It also contains Bakuchiol that speeds up skin cell turnover rate thus reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. What's more? It also helps repair and reverse photoaging and pigmentation when used regularly.
  • 10% AHA + 5% PHA + 0.5% BHA Exfoliating Peel with Green Tea: It’s time to bring your weekend facial home! This gentle chemical peel contains Glycolic Acid (AHA) that works on uneven texture and hyperpigmentation, Salicylic Acid (BHA) that removes whiteheads, blackheads and unclogs pores and finally, Gluconolactone (PHA) that gently exfoliates the top layer without causing irritation or redness. This triple-action exfoliation formula thereby improves skin texture and reduces pigmentation.

No artificial colours, fragrances or essential oils added!

products.title: Phy Arctic | Eau De Toilette | Aqua + Patchouli | Icy Freshness | For that charged-up feeling | 100 ml
products.body_html:
Charge up, on-the-go!
Feel the freedom and freshness with Phy Arctic. It opens with refreshing notes of Aqua, Grapefruit and Italian Mandarin. At the heart of the perfume are woody notes of Guaiac Wood, Bay Leaf, and Egyptian Jasmine, while the base features sweet & energizing notes of Oakmoss and Patchouli. It takes its cue from both the sea and the sky. Caution: The freshness here is unmistakable.  

Benefits
  • Subtle yet long-lasting fragrance 
  • Works as the best icebreaker on dates, perfect for everyday use
Who is it for?
For guys who don’t shy away from making the first move. Phy Arctic is suitable for all kinds of guys and all kinds of skin.
How to use
  • Spritz on pulse points from a distance of 15 cm. 
  • Do not rub the perfume liquid onto your skin. Let it dry on its own.
  • Do not spray in the air and walk through. 
  • Do not spray it on your clothes. 
    Key Ingredients 

     

    Top Notes: Aqua, Italian Mandarin, Grapefruit 

    Middle Notes: Guaiac Wood, Bay Leaf, Egyptian Jasmine 

    Base Notes: Amergris, Patchouli, Oakmoss 

     

    Ingredients
    Odoriferous Alcoholic Solution, Fragrance, Water, Avobenzone, Octyl Methoxycinnamate
